Following tables were made by Nibbler from The Rat Catchers Guild Discord and all due credit goes to them!

Lodging prices

Length of stay Best Good Normal Poor Worst
1 day (0% off) 40/- 20/- 10/- 5/- 2/6
1 week (10% off) 14GC 8/- 7GC 4/- 3GC 12/- 1GC 16/- 18/-
1 month (25% off) 48Gc 24GC 12GC 6GC 3GC
1 quarter (50% off) 96GC 48GC 24GC 12GC 6GC
1 year (75% off) 192GC 96GC 48GC 24GC 12GC

Food and Drinks prices

Item Best Good Normal Poor Worst
Ale, pint 1/- 6d 3d 2d 1d
Ale, keg 12/- 6/- 3/- 1/6 9d
Bugman's XXXXXX Ale, pint 3/- 1/6 9d - -
Food, groveries/day 3/4 1/8 10d 5d 3d
Meal, inn 4/- 2/- 1/- 6d 3d
Rations, 1 day 8/- 4/- 2/- 1/- 6d
Room, common/night 3/4 1/8 10d 5d 3d
Room, private/night 2GC 1GC 10/- 5/- 2/6
Spirits, pint 8/- 4/- 2/- 1/- 6d
Stables, night 3/4 1/8 10d 5d 3d
Wine, bottle 3/4 1/8 10d 5d 3d
Wine & Spirits, drink 1/4 8d 4d 2d 1d
Galloping Trots % - - - 10% 20%
text.markdown:
Following tables were made by ***Nibbler*** from **The Rat Catchers Guild** Discord and all due credit goes to them!

## Lodging prices

|    Length of stay   |   Best   |   Good  |  Normal  |   Poor   | Worst | 
|:-------------------:|:--------:|:-------:|:--------:|:--------:|:-----:| 
| 1 day (0% off)      |   40/-   |   20/-  |   10/-   |    5/-   |  2/6  |
| 1 week (10% off)    | 14GC 8/- | 7GC 4/- | 3GC 12/- | 1GC 16/- |  18/- | 
| 1 month (25% off)   |   48Gc   |   24GC  |   12GC   |    6GC   |  3GC  | 
| 1 quarter (50% off) |   96GC   |   48GC  |   24GC   |   12GC   |  6GC  | 
| 1 year (75% off)    |   192GC  |   96GC  |   48GC   |   24GC   |  12GC |

## Food and Drinks prices

| Item                      | Best | Good | Normal | Poor | Worst |
|---------------------------|:----:|:----:|:------:|:----:|:-------:|
| Ale, pint                 |  1/- |  6d  |   3d   |  2d  |    1d   |
| Ale, keg                  | 12/- |  6/- |   3/-  |  1/6 |    9d   |
| Bugman's XXXXXX Ale, pint |  3/- |  1/6 |   9d   |   -  |    -    |
| Food, groveries/day       |  3/4 |  1/8 |   10d  |  5d  |    3d   |
| Meal, inn                 |  4/- |  2/- |   1/-  |  6d  |    3d   |
| Rations, 1 day            |  8/- |  4/- |   2/-  |  1/- |    6d   |
| Room, common/night        |  3/4 |  1/8 |   10d  |  5d  |    3d   |
| Room, private/night       |  2GC |  1GC |  10/-  |  5/- |   2/6   |
| Spirits, pint             |  8/- |  4/- |   2/-  |  1/- |    6d   |
| Stables, night            |  3/4 |  1/8 |   10d  |  5d  |    3d   |
| Wine, bottle              |  3/4 |  1/8 |   10d  |  5d  |    3d   |
| Wine & Spirits, drink     |  1/4 |  8d  |   4d   |  2d  |    1d   |
| Galloping Trots %         |   -  |   -  |    -   |  10% |   20%   |
